data.title: ATLAS ROLLING MILL MFG.CO.
data.text:
Decades of Experience

We believe in offering services that exceed the high expectations put forward by our customers. Our dedication to creating this added value for our customers comes to life through our implementation of modern technologies, catered to the Steel Rolling Mill Business.

The unique design of Hot and Cold Steel Rolling Mill Plant and Equipments given by us helps you to produce diff items from one Plant just by changing one set of Rolls. Our products are up to the standards of IS0-9001by using internationally specified materials/techniques.

ATLAS Rolling Mill Mfg. Co. plays a vital role in contributing to the robust steel manufacturing landscape of Northern India. With an unswerving commitment to excellence, the company continues to be a reliable source for high-quality steel, symbolizing trust, integrity, and proficiency in every roll produced.

Our Quality

ATLAS ROLLING MILL MFG.CO is known in the industry for our quality-consciousness. For that, we have a thorough testing facility in our lab. Every stage of manufacturing process, right from procuring the raw material to the dispatch of the finished products is strictly administered by a group of experienced quality inspectors for the hassle free operations and no loophole is left while monitoring all the products.

Strategically located in Mandi Gobindgarh, ATLAS Rolling Mill leverages the region's industrial prowess and skilled workforce to produce top-notch steel products. The company's dedication to quality extends beyond the certification, encompassing a culture of innovation and customer satisfaction.
